2000330.name: Alaskan Road Truckers Demo
2000330.description: Discover the thrill of the Alaskan wilderness in this exclusive one hour demo. Test your skills in a driving simulator that puts you in the heart of the action, as you take on the risks and rewards of becoming an Alaskan trucking legend. Navigate perilous routes, tackle on-the-spot repairs, and embrace the survival elements that make every mile an adventure.
2000330.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 日语, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 简体中文, 土耳其语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
